name: The Ball (itch) (Jarod Haney)
description:
The Ball is a short journey following an unnamed test subject which is controlled by the player. You wake up in an unknown location in a lab coat, and are tasked to begin making choices. By selecting from the choices, you play as a person struggling to find independence and potential escape from an abusive companion. Constantly re-evaluate your stance with your companion. Is the pain you must go through ample price for survival. Do you leave its side and try to make it on your own, or do you value your life over suffering through the ball?

Play through multiple times to find it! Try to escape, or try to appease the ball, living under its control.
